DESCRIPTION: First choice in a card choice.
Second choice in a card choice.
Third choice in a card choice.
For your next X choices, activate all possibilities.
Look at the X bottom cards of your discard pile. You may move any of them to your draw pile.
Move the X bottom cards of your discard pile to your draw pile.
Exhausted on play, discard and turn end.
When drawn, discard it and draw #b1 card.
